summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.8°C) and outside temperature (down 3.5°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 8003 lux) and cloud levels (up 290 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15456 lux), cloud levels (up 1754 m), feels like temperature (up 6.6°C), and outside temperature (up 5.5°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 290.0m lower than yesterday, 1160.8m lower than past week, 1754.2m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 975.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2140m and 2730m respectively.
